summary: Three people from different walks of life find themselves trapped inside a stalled elevator. What at first seems like an inconvenience rapidly escalates into a nightmare.
cast: Amber Tamblyn|Aidan Gillen|Armie Hammer|Katie Stuart|Mabel Rivera|Claudia Bassols|Kate Jennings Grant|Emma Prescott|Erin Guzowski|Jim Arnold|Andrew Tarbet|Jane Partridge|Diana Van Proosdy|Peggy Batchelor|Rubén Castro|Beatriz Martínez|Luana Lauverski|Fiona Rycroft|Luis Botella|Mark Boone Junior|Leslie Charles|Alvaro Roque
keywords: man carries a woman|man murders a woman|man punches a woman|slasher|character repeats someone else's dialogue
title: Blackout
